title: Graphic-Based Learning Design Tool Utilization and Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using basic online learning tools
context.additional_context: Project-based course emphasizing learning design focused on analyzing social phenomena

learning_goals: Learners can complete a two-tiered (concept/flow) learning design document using graphic-based tools.
Learners can demonstrate the process of deploying a designed learning model into an LMS environment.
Learners can analyze the usability and educational flexibility of design tools through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
